name: Sample Player (Scrub)
description: This algorithm is based on the Audio Playback with Scrub algorithm from the disting mk4. It allows direct control of sample playback position via CV input or a scrub parameter, simulating dragging tape over a playhead manually. The sample must be triggered before playback begins and again to change samples (unless 'Retrigger on change' is enabled). The display shows the waveform, playhead position as a check mark, and current playback speed (positive for forward, negative for reversed playback).
use_cases: Manual sample position control via CV or parameter
gui_description: The display shows the waveform with a playhead position indicated by a check mark above it. The current playback speed is also shown, where positive values indicate forwards playback and negative values indicate reversed playback.

specifications.name: Sample rate compatibility
specifications.description: Compatible with standard audio sample rates

input_ports.name: Scrub input
input_ports.description: CV input for scrubbing the sample playback position. Voltage range is defined by Min CV and Max CV parameters.

input_ports.name: Sample trigger
input_ports.description: Trigger to start or change the sample playback (unless 'Retrigger on change' is enabled).

output_ports.name: Audio output
output_ports.description: The processed audio signal with scrub-controlled playback position.

output_ports.name: Playback speed indicator
output_ports.description: CV or visual feedback of the current playback speed (positive for forward, negative for reversed).
